Muito Bom não Me arrependo de ter comprado

Kinda great, Kinda awful. 

Love this game, I've played it on and off for six years now. There are a lot of cheaters now, especially at the higher matchmaking ranks (Currently, LE whilst writing this review.) Its sad to see really, its just going to discourage new players from putting in the hours. Not everybody wants to play FACEIT, the base game should suffice but it barely does nowadays. There is also a lot of toxicity, I put this down to different cultures having distastes towards one another. Another issue which has been present as long as I can remember. Having an option to separate servers further, or at least to play with specifically people of your nationality would work wonders I feel.
Its a great game, and will always be a great game, its just, in need of some more love. The community love it, but it seems the creators don't. I 100% recommend CS:GO, but understand it will be a Love/Hate relationship as long as you play.

Editing review for steam awards: Still full of hackers at the higher MM Ranks. Caved in and started playing faceit.
